attributes.action: Scotland to take 1/3 of UK debt if they leave the UK and UK to get a vote too
attributes.additional_details: Let Scotland vote on independence but then also let England, Wales and Northern Ireland to vote on their own Independence and also let them vote if they want Scotland to stay in the UK.
attributes.background: If Scotland finally get independence from the UK it is only fair if they take one third of the UK debt which stands at £1.5 trillion. The UK has spent enough money on Scotland for the past 300 years and all we get is independence threats and anti-English/British insults.
